title: CCTV Specialist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- 1 time per game, you may transport another player to a safe location, this will negate any negative visits that may occur to them that night.
- Twice per game, you may add another charge to this ability.
- 3 times per game, you mays end an anonymous tip to other NETSEC or Townies about what your target might be. This will have 3 roles, one of them being your target's.
- You may choose to apply a camera to any player's house, you will be notified of who visits your target every night after. 2 night cooldown
- Twice per game, you may follow another player and learn who they'll visit tonight.
- Once per game, you may become an Improvised Hacker (Post 2174). You will retain all your attributes. Available N3 onwards
